mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Smoke on the Water", "Teasing", and "'Cross the Way" ROUND DANCES "Missouri River Gal" and "Melody Waltz" SPECIAL FEATURES "That Baird Man Known as Pancho", "The Caller and Musicians, Chapter One", "National Convention Highlights", "Gimmick Square Dancing", "Waltz Quadrilles - The Modern Way", "Procedure for Submission of Bids to National Convention", "Baile de la Cuadrilla En Vieja Mexico", and "Style Series: The Promenade". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
